permissions: Admins can delete tractors. Non-admins can delete tractors when they are authorized to update the tractor trucker via TruckerPolicy.
side_effects: Deletes the tractor record if allowed.
validation_notes: --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked when the tractor is related to shifts (TruckerShiftSet or TenderJobScheduleShift) or trailers; deletion fails if can_delete? is false.
